meanings.definition: A detail or point of minor importance.
meanings.sent1: The teacher didn't worry about the technicality of the font in the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She always focused on the big picture and didn't get caught up in technicalities.
meanings.sent3: The technicality of the color of the paperclip made everyone laugh in the office.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with the technicality of the font size was like a magnifying glass on a tiny ant.
meanings.sent5: The technicality of the paint color made the room feel cozy and warm.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being technical.
meanings.sent1: Her job required a high level of technicality in understanding computer systems.
meanings.sent2: The technicality of his work impressed his colleagues and clients.
meanings.sent3: The technicality of the instructions made it seem like a puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: The technicality of the machinery hummed like a well-oiled engine.
meanings.sent5: His expertise in the technicality of coding was unmatched in the company.

meanings.definition: A minor detail in the interpretation of a law or rule.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer found a technicality in the contract that saved her client from a lawsuit.
meanings.sent2: The judge dismissed the case due to a technicality in the evidence presented.
meanings.sent3: The technicality in the parking regulations caused confusion among the drivers.
meanings.sent4: The technicality in the legal document was like a hidden trap waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: His attention to the technicality of the wording in the law helped him win the case.
